Text: Accounting Research Manager User PasswordArthur Andersen VantageSource Date PM From James K Hemore Arthur Andersens US Accounting Research Managersuperscript TM We recently emailed your user ID for the US Accounting Research Manager For security reasons we did not send your password at that time Below you will find your password Your password is hays To ensure your access into the system and to ensure security please do not share your ID and password If you have any questions regarding your Internet access please call US CANADA MEXICO VantageSource Order Desk AATS Support UNITED KINGDOM VantageSource Order Desk AATS Support INTERNATIONAL CALLS VantageSource AATS Support

Accounting Research Manager User IDArthur Andersen VantageSource Date PM From James K Hemore Welcome to Arthur Andersens US Accounting Research Manager You now have full access to this comprehensive database for a full year We are pleased to service your financial reporting needs HOW TO ACCESS The Internet address for the US Accounting Research Manager site is NOTE for recent Trial users this is a different address than the day trial site To access US Accounting Research Manager according to the option you selected INTERNET ONLY SUBSCRIBERS This provides access to a realtime comprehensive database via the Internet Enter the above address into your browser and set as a FAVORITE For recent trial users if you set the trial site as a FAVORITE please be sure to reset the above address Click on ACCESS TO ACCOUNTING RESEARCH MANAGER FOR INTERNET SUBSCRIBER You will be prompted for your user name featured below and password to be sent in a separate email For recent trial users your trial user name and password are identical to your full subscription user name and password You will then see the opening page of the US Accounting Research Manager TIPS REMINDERS HOW TO USE US ACCOUNTING RESEARCH MANAGER To better familiarize you with this tool and maximize your time we suggest when you first visit the site to access the link FOR ASSISTANCE GETTING STARTED CLICK HERE NOW in the lower left hand corner of the navigator pane This will guide you through Overview Tutorial How to Use Research Manager Tips Support tools FAQ commonly asked questions and answers Glossary US ACCOUNTING RESEARCH MANAGER REFERENCE SHEET We have also attached an Accounting Research Manager reference sheet to help you navigate through the database See attached file ARMreferencePDF Your User Name is hayslettr Password For security reasons you will receive in a separate mailing If you have any questions regarding your Internet access please call US CANADA MEXICO AATS Support UNITED KINGDOM AATS Support INTERNATIONAL CALLS AATS Support ARMreferencePDF
